## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.md`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                      | Description                   | Default value |
|-------------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| MARKDOWN_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| MARKDOWN_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
